SqlOperation.Name: GetEffectiveByUser
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT a.Access, 'user' as `Source` FROM `idp_users_accesses` a WHERE a.`UserId` = @UserId UNION SELECT ug.Access, 'user_group' as `Source` FROM `idp_user_groups_accesses` ug INNER JOIN `idp_user_group_membership` ugm ON ug.`GroupId` = ugm.`GroupId` WHERE ugm.`UserId` = @UserId UNION SELECT p.Access, 'privilege' as `Source` FROM `idp_privileges_accesses` p INNER JOIN `idp_role_privileges` rp ON p.`PrivilegeId` = rp.`PrivilegeId` INNER JOIN `idp_role_membership` rm ON rp.`RoleId` = rm.`RoleId` WHERE rm.`UserId` = @UserId
